description: This table contains free-text follow-ups comments describing why a service request for continued care and services coordination is being considered when the Considering Follow-up of '99 - Other (comment)' is selected.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: DP_FAC_RSN_COMMENT
columns.description: Free-text comment entered for the selected Considering Follow-up category value of '99 - Other (comment).'
